materials.raw_text:
Arsenic Trioxide (As2O3) - 40 g 
 Cobalt(II) Oxide (CoO) - 10 g 
 Zinc Oxide (ZnO) - 100 g 
 Sodium Nitrate (NaNO3) - 15 g 
 Silica (SiO2) - 200 g

sourcing.instructions:
Arsenic Trioxide: Specialty chemical suppliers or online chemical retailers. 
 Cobalt(II) Oxide: Available at chemical supply stores or online. 
 Zinc Oxide: Commonly found in pharmacies and chemical supply websites. 
 Sodium Nitrate: Fertilizer suppliers or chemical retailers. 
 Silica: Available at hardware stores or chemical suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Wear protective gear including gloves, goggles, and a mask. 
 2. Weigh out each ingredient accurately using a precision scale. 
 3. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine Arsenic Trioxide, Cobalt(II) Oxide, Zinc Oxide, Sodium Nitrate, and Silica. 
 4. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer until a uniform powder is achieved.
